Recommendations: Faculty members shall be encouraged to develop instructional materials like books, manuals and modules in their area of specialization. Giving of financial assistance to cover the, production cost maybe considered.
Faculty members who have written books shall secure ISBN for their instructional material.
The creation of textbook committee who will evaluate the books to be used by the faculty and students in the different subject areas may be done
Purchase of additional instructional media such as overhead projectors, LCD to . enhance teaching-learning process should be given priority
The number of hours intended for research, extension, consultation and other assigned task should be reflected in the workload aside from the subject assignment of the faculty.
Faculty shall be encouraged to present papers not only in regional and national but also in international fora and conferences.
Faculty shall be encouraged to write and publish papers in refereed journals.
A more systematic and organized presentation of accreditation documents for the program should be observed.
